name: Billy The Astrosaur
description:
Dinosaurs say that Dinos should be Fierce! But all Billy wants to be is an Astrosaur.

Made in 10 ish hours for the 22nd OC Tilted Shed Jam

The Game was made with the phrase "Fierce Dinosaur" and the following random Mad Lib as a theme:

One day I will visit space. I will build a rocketship that looks like a FABERGE EGG. I will EAT before blasting off in the rocketship. I will go past the INTEGRATED CIRCUIT and EXPLOSIONS in the sky. I will land on the moon. I will meet an alien named GAS MASK. The alien will teach me how to Be Fierce and Love Myself on the moon. I will say goodbye to the alien and and CIRCULATE back to the rocketship. When I get back to BANANA NOIR, I will see that the alien has given me a CONSPIRACY THEORY as a going-away present. I will happily CELBRATE before going to bed that night.
